SELECT t.* ,m.is_digital_editor_optional ,m.is_force_end ,u.realname
FROM textbook t inner join material m on m.id = t.material_id left join pmph_user u on t.planning_editor = u.id WHERE t.id = #{textBookId}

update dec_position_temp t , dec_position d set d.chosen_position = ( case when t.chosen_position in (1,9) then t.chosen_position
when t.chosen_position >=8 and d.chosen_position < 8 and d.chosen_position not in (1,9) then d.chosen_position + 8 when t.chosen_position >=8 and d.chosen_position in (1,9) then 8 when t.chosen_position < 8 and d.chosen_position >=8 and d.chosen_position not in (1,9) then d.chosen_position - 8 when t.chosen_position < 8 and d.chosen_position in (1,9) then 0 else d.chosen_position end ) where d.id = t.id and d.textbook_id = #{textBookId} and t.author_id=${logUserId} and t.is_background = 0
update textbook set is_list_selected = #{is_list_selected} where id = #{textBookId}
